Welcome to Calm Space

A calm and supportive space to explore mental health, take a breath, and find help when needed.

Helplines Learn More

Learn More

Understanding Mental Health

Mental health affects how we think, feel, and cope with everyday life.

Recognising Challenges

Mental health challenges can appear differently for everyone.

Support & Self-Care

Small steps and support can make a big difference.

Tips for Managing Stress

Managing stress is about recognising when you feel overwhelmed and using healthy strategies, such as breathing, time management, and taking breaks, to regain balance. Learning to manage stress can improve your wellbeing, focus, and emotional resilience. Watch the video below to learn more about managing stress effectively.

Helplines

If you need immediate support, use one of the numbers or resources below. If this is an emergency, call your local emergency number immediately.

Emergency (24/7)

999

Call now

Mental Health Support
